Uses of Package
it.apice.sapere.node.agents

Packages that use it.apice.sapere.node.agents
it.apice.sapere.management This package contains all the entities dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.management.impl This package contains all the implementations dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.node This package contains some node's services. 
it.apice.sapere.node.agents This package contains the SAPEREagents taxonomy. 
it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl This package contains the SAPEREagents implementations. 
it.apice.sapere.node.internal This package contains the Bundle Activator and other utilities. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.bluetooth.impl This package contains entities dedicated to Bluetooth management. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.guestsmngt.impl This package contains entities dedicated to Guests handling. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.obsnotif.impl This package contains the subsystem dedicated to the notification (and management) of remote observation of LSA-space events. 
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.node.agents used by it.apice.sapere.management
SAPEREAgent
           This interface models a generic agent running on the SAPERE middleware.
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.node.agents used by it.apice.sapere.management.impl
AbstractSystemAgent
           This class provides a basic realization of a SAPERE System Agent, which is an agent concerned with system administration task.
NodeServices
           Basic interface for the entity capable of retrieving a reference to each node service.
SAPEREAgent
           This interface models a generic agent running on the SAPERE middleware.

           This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.node.agents used by it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl
AbstractAccessPolicy
           This class is conceived in order to analyze the requests that an agent forwards and filter out those whose are not legal according to some SAPEREmodel constraint.
LSAspaceAccessPolicy
           This interface models a proxy capable of filtering requests to the LSA-space and forward only the allowed ones.
SAPEREAgent
           This interface models a generic agent running on the SAPERE middleware.
SAPEREAgentsFactory
           This interface models a service capable of creating (local) SAPEREAgents on a SAPERE-node.
SAPEREAgentSpec
           This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.
SAPERESysAgentSpec
           This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.
